title: Comedor de la Clinica Good Hope
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Peruvian
description: Vegetarian cafeteria on the 10th floor of the Clinica Good Hope Hospital run by Seventh Day Adventists, in the Miraflores neighborhood. Choose what you want and you are charged by the kilo. Hot bar, salad bar, desserts, breads, etc. Plenty of options for vegans. Views of the surrounding area, including the Pacific Ocean.
